posts.post_content: @Diachronos yes the spike would still have it's effect (though only deathtouch would mean anything b/c the second ability specifies combat damage). The game would also check for any other equipments or enchantments that were on it before it left the field (so if he had a [Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer) on him when you sacced him, you would also gain 2 life).
posts.html:
@Diachronos yes the spike would still have it's effect (though only deathtouch would mean anything b/c the second ability specifies combat damage). The game would also check for any other equipments or enchantments that were on it before it left the field (so if he had a Loxodon Warhammer on him when you sacced him, you would also gain 2 life).

Posted By: Flyheight (9/19/2010 9:56:47 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Ridiculously. Good.  
  
I would argue this guy is the second best creature for RDW in standard right now, behind [Goblin Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Guide). The utility of having an unstoppable 2 damage once he's on the field in addition to being a beater makes him better than [Kargan Dragonlord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kargan Dragonlord), better than [Kiln Fiend](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kiln Fiend), and better than [Plated Geopede](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Plated Geopede) (all of whom are sitting ducks to removal). Often times an opponent will be forced to use removal on this guy, which just means their spell fizzles and they get shocked for 2. Hoping for a reprint in M12.  
  
Plus, the flavor is awesome!
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
[Mogg Fanatic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mogg Fanatic) was good. This is Mogg Fanatic x 2 that trades with bears.  
  
@ Diachronos:  
No. Quietus Spike's wording strictly says that the damage has to be combat damage. Noncombat damage, even from a creature source, will not trigger [Quietus Spike](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Quietus Spike).
posts.html:
Mogg Fanatic was good. This is Mogg Fanatic x 2 that trades with bears.
